Introduction to R (July 2020)

Our first workshop in the days of COVID-19.

  • Module: R for Reproducible Scientific Analysis
  • Instructors: Jason Wallace, Davis Gimode, Kendall Williams, Mark Miller
  • Sessions:
    1. Introcution to R and Rstudio
    2. Data types and reading/writing data
    3. Data frames
    4. More data frames and conditionals
    5. Plotting data with ggplot2
    6. R notebooks
